# [Interview #974: AMOL Signing Report - J. Dauro, Entry #86](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=974#86)

#### Question

How can Mat use gateways when he is wearing the medallion?

#### Brandon Sanderson

He doesn't touch any weaves when he goes through.
